House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02733
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF ALTERNATIVE LEARNING SYSTEM (ALS) COMMUNITY LEARNING CENTERS FOR EVERY CITY AND MUNICIPALITY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
